messages.title: Labour is fighting for fairness in our communities!
messages.content: Being from Powys taught me what a unique part of the world we live in. Our shared sense of fairness and community pride makes us stronger, all of us.

messages.title: Winning the fight for Britain's future
messages.content: Chris Lloyd supports the tough action that was taken during Gordon Brown's Government to stop the country from going into a slump after the Global Banks let people down. Now is the time to stay true to these ideals and ensure recovery by acting to help the poor. Labour is the only party who will take the idea of 'The Big Society' and apply it, not only to volunteers, but also to everyone in the UK.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Chris Lloyd supports the tough action that was taken to avoid a slump after the Global Banks let people down. He emphasizes recovery by helping the poor and ensuring the idea of 'The Big Society' applies to everyone.

Labour's commitment to the elderly will lead to better healthcare and promises to have one hundred new or refurbished community hospitals, with the Tories' cuts and child trust funds cut. Labour commits to the NHS.
Labour vows not to cut child tax credits and child trust funds which the Tories would cut.

issues.economy: Chris Lloyd supports the tough action that was taken to avoid a slump after the Global Banks let people down. He emphasizes recovery by helping the poor and ensuring the idea of 'The Big Society' applies to everyone.
issues.health: Labour's commitment to the elderly will lead to better healthcare and promises to have one hundred new or refurbished community hospitals, with the Tories' cuts.
issues.socialWelfare: Labour vows not to cut child tax credits and child trust funds which the Tories would cut.

leaflet.personalStatement: Being from Powys taught me what a unique part of the world we live in. Our shared sense of fairness and community pride makes us stronger, all of us.

politicalExperience.achievements: Chris has been active in the local elections across Radnorshire. Most notably in the local Brecon and Radnorshire Hospital PTPT Labour gained a victory for a light to be turned back on for ITU/HDU ward.

endorsements.endorsement: We're voting for Chris Lloyd because of Labour's commitment to the elderly we would have our home under the Tories! His commitment to the NHS also shines through.

images.caption: Chris Lloyd with supporters and constituents.
